text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse This is why we need to get Trump & his people out of the WH. They said sending kids back to school only .02% of kids are likely to die from Coronavirus. Is that all, just .02%. if just one single child is likely to die, it’s to high of price. Trump don’t care about our kids!
